channel.title: lunch on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lunch on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lunchin
item.description: Interesting to see an expanded version of Enneagram, with 12 types instead of 9.

item.title: great chat with Joel
item.description: 15:51 Monday 01 October 2018 JST I met Joel for lunch in Roppongi today. Ate at a falafel cafe near Almond. It was vegan delicious! Great to catch up with him and share stories about how we are doing in Tokyo!

item.title: ate at a churrascuria
item.description: 15:40 Wednesday 27 December 2017 -02 Lin and I ate lunch with R & D and D’s auunt R and three of R’s nephews. I took the longest to eat due to chewing chewing chewing. The meat was a bit tough given that we arrived near the end of their lunch session. D drove me, Lin and his aunt R in the Range Rover, while R drove his three nephews in a rental car.

item.title: free lunch after lesson at NB
item.description: 01:40 Wednesday 30 August 2017 JST Today after teaching for 2 hours at NB, they offered me lunch! Yay! Today was Yusuke’s last day! Booo!! All the students seemed to enjoy the lesson! Yay!!

item.title: last(?) lunch with Esther
item.description: 15:47 Thursday 27 July 2017 JST I ate lunch with Esther in Ueno station before she moves to Okinawa. It sounds like she’s found a good job down there; I hope it works out well!

item.title: Mitsue came to TESOL
item.description: 17:52 Monday 26 June 2016 JST Yay! Mitsue came to the second half of the TESOL course taught by Rob Waring. We both found it to be quite useful. Went for non-alcoholic drinks at convenie afterward and I griped about the state of Apple as I see it. No gripes about seeing Mitsue!

item.title: lunch
item.description: 13:00 Monday 25 January 2016 PST Great to get some extended time with closer family. John (who danced like a pro last night), Karen, and Maya (who politely refused to dance last night) all had to leave a bit earlier, but we hugged them bye and chatted about 35 more minutes during which time Mike de-res’d, and Lin presented Karina with the にゃんがる hoodie featuring cat ears and a pouch for cats (1 at a time, probably).

item.title: Miraikan
item.description: 12:57 Sunday 05 April 2015 JST Just finished lunch with peeps after seeing Miraikan first floor exhibits. I forgot to write during lunch; we’re leaving now. 13:04 We’re in line for the floating flower garden. Downstairs there were several interesting interactive exhibits. My favorite was a table with 300cc colored wooden blocks. Cameras above the table would detect the blocks and lights above the table would project rivers between blue blocks, planes flying between yellow blocks, railroad between red blocks, and highway between green blocks, and maybe helicopter landing pads on purple blocks (maybe).

item.title: Lunch at Paola and Jon's
item.description: ##11:12 Saturday 07 March 2015 JST## Lin and I are headed to Paola and Jon’s for lunch, and then I’m going to meet Nate at 3pm. Skype Nate at 5:30pm. Unfortunately, I’m still grouchy because of infuriating XCode, though I’m getting over it by doing something non-Apple related.

item.title: lunch
item.description: ##14:57 Wednesday 14 January 2015 JST## Yummy stew at JB for lunch! Thanks to Kayokok for making it!!

item.title: lunch between lessons at JBs
item.description: ##13:08 Saturday 06 December 2014 (written 01:19 Sunday 21 December 2014 JST) Wow! What a surprise!

item.title: lunch with M
item.description: ##11:51 Thursday 27 November 2014 JST## Going to lunch with M, with whom I zip lined on Sunday. ##15:00:11 We ate at Wired Cafe on the east side of Shinagawa station, then walked two blocks east, then south along the river, then across the river on a blue bridge, and saw some bicycle rental place called “bike sharing” though we’d have to pay. Continued south on the east side of the river to a large black metallic structure shaped like an O when viewed from the river, but like an n when looking parallel to the river.

item.title: met Lin's family today
item.description:
##14:44 Wednesday 02 January 2013
Toru, Charu, Atsumi, Tetsuya, Lin, Eiko, Iiru, Minako, Kathleen, Takumi, Rob, Fred, Mikako, and Yuu (not pictured) enjoyed lunch today in Kawasaki.
